verbose_text: An outbreak of disease in quail in Indonesia which was observed to have many of the characteristics of mycotoxicosis was investigated by Stolz et al. (1988), and a sample of the feed involved was found to contain CPA at 6000 ng/g, along with lower levels of aflatoxins (465 ng/g) and ochratoxin A (500 ng/g).
evidence:
levels of aflatoxins (465 ng/g) and
ochratoxin A
